expo.name: Teddy's Cleaning
expo.description: Professional cleaning services app with smart booking, real-time tracking, and eco-friendly solutions.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to find nearby cleaning services and provide accurate service estimates.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses location to track service progress and provide real-time updates.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses camera to take photos for service documentation and quality assurance.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses photo library to attach images to service requests and feedback.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses microphone for voice messages and customer support calls.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app accesses contacts to easily share service details with family and friends.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app accesses calendar to schedule cleaning appointments.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app creates reminders for upcoming cleaning appointments.
